d.Name: SAP Cloud for Customer Integration with SAP S/4HANA Cloud
d.Description: This integration package enables you to integrate business processes between SAP S/4HANA Cloud and SAP Cloud for Customer. The integration scope includes replication of Business Partners, Relationships, Organization Hierarchy and Materials between SAP Cloud for Customer and SAP S/4HANA Cloud.
